episodes.title: 20 Popular Celebrities Linked to Cults
episodes.description:
Even Hollywood's brightest stars aren't immune to the allure or dangers of controversial groups. Join us as we delve into the surprising connections between popular figures and organizations widely described as cults. From those born into them to others who joined later in life, these stories shed light on how fame and vulnerability can intersect with intense spiritual or social movements, revealing a darker side to the glittering world of celebrity. Our list explores famous names linked to groups like Children of God, Christian Science, NXIVM, and Scientology. Discover the tales of Joaquin Phoenix, Glenn Close, Allison Mack, Rose McGowan, Michele Pfeiffer, R. Kelly, Dennis Wilson, and the Arquette Family, whose lives were touched by these often-controversial organizations.

FOLLOW all our socials for more content here: https://linktr.ee/msmojo

Don't forget to play our Live Trivia games at 3pm EST for a chance to win cash! The faster you answer, the more points you get!: https://www.watchmojo.com/play
